濍字的基本解释

濍
sōng
象声词，水声。

濍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sōng］
［《集韻》蘇叢切，平東，心。］
(1)象声词。
(2)人名用字。明有盟津王朱见濍。见《明史·郑王朱瞻埈传》。

濍字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　濍； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页655第03
【玉篇】先公切【集韻】蘇叢切，?音松。水聲。

濍字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
濍字的起名意思

暂无。

sōng
Onomatopoeia, water sound.
Slap
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [sōng]
["Jiyun" Su Congqie, Pingdong, Heart. ]
(1) Onomatopoeia.
(2) Use characters for names. Ming Dynasty has Mengjin King Zhu Jianpi. See "The History of Ming Dynasty·The Biography of King Zheng and Zhu Zhanxian".
Slap
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Siji 1】【Water Word Department】　濍; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 655 No. 03
[Jade articles] First public cut [Jiyun] Su Cong cut, sound song. The sound of water.
